Chap. 1 - Selections Regarding

The Unwise Use of Money

The True Riches

                           Sanitarium, Cal., Dec. 7, 1903. 
     Christ beholds the world full of activity in seeking for earthly treasures. He sees many eagerly trying first one thing and then another in their effort to obtain the coveted earthly treasure which they think will satisfy their selfish greed, while in their eager pursuit they pass by the only path that leads to the true riches.
